article.title: Status and history for [eng]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: The official record of the Declaration (in English and French) is available from the UN site, at , and the English version at the UNHCHR site contains a couple of small differences. Our text has been corrected to accurately reflect the official record. Thanks to Benjamin Titze for pointing this out.
[Eric Muller] content, characters and PDF are clean.
[Eric Muller] U+002D - HYPHEN-MINUS resolved to U+2010 ‐ HYPHEN.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
